title: Mytheresa Acquires Yoox Net-a-Porter
description: Luxury e-tailer Mytheresa has successfully acquired the entirety of competing platform Yoox Net-a-Porter (YNAP) from its former owner Richemont in a €555 million cash and no-financial-debt deal. In exchange for 100% of YNAP, Richemont will receive a 33% equity stake in Mytheresa. A ...Continue reading
author: Brooke Frischer
